title: Scarf, "Wish You Were Here", 1989
medium:
Material: silk
Technique: Screen printed on plain woven silk sheer (chiffon)
inscribed: Written on ribbon dividing the field, "Wish you were here". signed in one corner, "Georgina von Etzdorf".
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Printed scarf with hand-rolled edges. The border has a finely detailed drawing of waves, fishes, nets and bouys, and mermaids. The field is divided by a long undulating ribbon; each side has an oval vignette with a seascape in a field of isolated wave caps. In dark gray, blue, yellow, and red on off-white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Scarf, "Wish You Were Here", 1989.
1989. Material: silk
Technique: Screen printed on plain woven silk sheer (chiffon). Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1991-9-1.
